text: The Australian and New Zealand Journal of Family Therapy is a quarterly peer- reviewed academic journal published by Wiley-Blackwell on behalf of the Australian Association of Family Therapy. The journal was established in 1979. It covers research related to family therapy, spanning subfields of psychology such as clinical psychology, therapy, counseling, and psychoanalysis. ==Abstract and indexing== The journal is abstracted or indexed in: *CINAHL *EBSCO databases *ProQuest databases *PsycINFO *Scopus *Social Sciences Citation Index According to the Journal Citation Reports, the journal has a 2017 impact factor of 0.575, ranking it 37th out of 46 journals in the category "Family Studies" and 706th out of 774 journals in the category "Psychiatry/Psychology". ==References== ==External links== * Category:Wiley- Blackwell academic journals Category:English-language journals Category:Publications established in 1979 Category:Quarterly journals Category:Clinical psychology journals Category:Psychotherapy journals
title: Australian and New Zealand Journal of Family Therapy
